00010 #include <stdio.h>

00014 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00015 This function strips the leading and trailing spaces of a string
00016 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00017 char *trimstr(char *s)
00018 {
00019   int i = 0;
00020   int len;
00021 
00022   /*--- Strip leading blanks  */
00023   /*--- First find 1st non-blank  */
00024   while (s[i] == ' ') {
00025     i++;
00026   }
00027   strcpy(s,s+i);
00028 
00029   /*--- Strip trailing blanks  */
00030   len = strlen(s);
00031   while (isspace(s[len-1])) {
00032     s[len-1] = '\0';
00033         len--;
00034   }
00035 
00036   return(s);
00037 }
